meanings.meaning: when[if] it comes to the point

vlive.korean: 이렇게 막상 하려면 생각이 안 난다니까? Why can't I remember? 듣기 View video TWICE : 힝
막상 칠하니까 귀엽네 - 그렇지? but it's actually cute after coloring. - See? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.13
vlive.english: but it's actually cute after coloring. - See?

vlive.korean: 오 막상 하려니 떨리네요 왜 떨리지? Thinking of it now, I am so nervous!! Why am I? 듣기 View video NCT : Jisung day💚💚
vlive.english: Thinking of it now, I am so nervous!! Why am I?

vlive.korean: 막상 오니까 너무 재밌네요 여러분, 어떡하지? It's so much fun now. What should I do? 듣기 View video BTS : 저 왔어요~!
vlive.english: It's so much fun now. What should I do?

vlive.korean: [막상 시작하니 의욕 넘치는 슈가] 형 형 형 오케이! [Enthusiastic SUGA] Hey, hey, hey! Okay! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.100

examples.korean: I’m not sure what I’ll do when the chips are down. 발음듣기 막상 일이 닥치면 내가 어떻게 할지는 확실히 모르겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m not sure what I’ll do when the chips are down. 발음

examples.korean: You’ll feel differently about it when the time comes. 발음듣기 막상 그 시간[때]이 되면 당신은 그것에 대해 다르게 생각할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll feel differently about it when the time comes. 발음

examples.korean: I got very nervous about the exam, but in the event, I needn’t have worried; it was really easy. 발음듣기 나는 시험 때문에 몹시 초조했지만 막상 닥쳐 보니 걱정할 필요가 없었다. 정말 쉬웠으니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I got very nervous about the exam, but in the event, I needn’t have worried; it was really easy. 발음

examples.korean: The wind failed us. 발음듣기 (막상 필요할 때에) 바람이 안 불었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
Now that he's leaving, I'm sorry to see him go. 발음듣기 그가 막상 떠난다고 하니 서운하다 Neungyule
examples.english: Now that he's leaving, I'm sorry to see him go. 발음
